name: Feeshy
description:
For Low Effort Game Jam - 03/15/2021
Become a fish farmer, fish up some fish, plant some fish, grow some fish!

Click Play to start!

Go to the fishing scene and click on the rod to catch a fish!

When you've caught some fish head to the farm and then click the dirt to plant them! Once they're grown you can pick them and one day sell them to the store :)

(Currently the store is sold out and the fish dont grow because they are fish)

Credits

Programmers: Nikhil Tokala and Aaron Farley

Music: Edward Hinds

Sound Design: Jacenta Yu

Art: Duwido
